content:
Craft an item of type: wooden_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 54, "index": 17}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 32, "index": 34}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a wooden_pickaxe, I need to first craft warped_planks. To craft warped_planks, I need to place 1 warped_hyphae in the crafting table. The warped_hyphae is located at slot 38. Therefore, I will move the warped_hyphae to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: wooden_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 54, "index": 17}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 28, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherite_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 32, "index": 34}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the warped_hyphae is placed in the crafting table, I can craft the warped_planks. I will move the warped_planks from the crafting slot (0) to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a wooden_pickaxe, I need to place 3 oak_planks on top of each other in the first column of the crafting grid, and 2 sticks in the second column of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the oak_planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
